story_26_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Wow! We got to battle a lot of different sync
pairs! But...
story_26_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: We were way stronger than all of them!
story_26_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Th-that’s so weird. The machine should be
functioning normally...
story_26_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Soffy, Clemont, why don’t you give it
an inspection?
story_26_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Good idea. You should figure out what exactly is
causing it to malfunction.
story_26_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
But I’m not sure [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s
team has that much time to spare...
story_26_05000/2401_0401_0900_10: Y-yeah, I’m sure it’ll be fine...
story_26_05000/2401_0402_1100_10: But that’ll just be a waste of time for you all...
story_26_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Let’s trust them, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’m sure it will work right next time.
story_26_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
OK! Third time’s the charm! It’s gotta work right
this time!
